sentences.en: A small dram of whisky may be prescribed by doctors for those over 60 to help them sleep. It is vital though to emphasize that "small" is the operative word.
sentences.cn: 医生可以建议60岁以上的老人少量地喝点威士忌以改善睡眠，然而至关重要的是必须强调“少量”这个关键词。

sentences.en: As long as the operative word is "greed", you can't count on people keeping the costs down.
sentences.cn: 只要“贪婪”仍是一切的出发点，就别指望人们会降低成本。

sentences.en: External causes become operative through internal causes.
sentences.cn: 外因通过内因而起作用.

sentences.en: Her aggressive moods alternated with gentle or more co-operative states.
sentences.cn: 她情绪多变，时而咄咄逼人，时而又显得温柔平和或乐于合作。

sentences.en: I made every effort to be co-operative.

sentences.cn: 只有一条跑道可以使用。
手术复位必须加以考虑.

sentences.en: The airport is operative again after the bad weather.
sentences.cn: 恶劣天气过后机场又重新运行了.

sentences.en: The bicycle factory is now a workers'co - operative.
sentences.cn: 这家自行车制造厂现在是工人的集体企业.

sentences.en: The commercial telephone service was no longer operative.
sentences.cn: 商业电话服务已不再运营。
“ 实质性 ” 一词用得有道理.

sentences.en: The President said the visit would develop friendly and co-operative relations between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 总统说这次访问将会促进两国之间的友好合作关系。

sentences.en: The restaurant is run as a co-operative.
sentences.cn: 这家饭店是合作经营的。

sentences.en: the steps to be taken before the scheme can become operative
sentences.cn: 这项计划实施之前需要采取的步骤

sentences.en: The surgeon must therefore assume that all operative wounds will contain bacteria.
sentences.cn: 外科医生必须假定所有手术伤口都将含有细菌.

sentences.en: They decided a housing co-operative was the way to regenerate Ormiston Crescent.
sentences.cn: 他们最终决定通过住房合作社来重建奥米斯顿月牙街。

sentences.en: When I say " come quickly ", the operative word is " quickly ".
sentences.cn: 我说 “ 快来 ”, 关键的字是 “ 快 ”.

words.tran_cn: 操作的；[外科] 外科手术的
自发反应；操作性制约；发生作用之人或物
操作；经营；[外科] 手术；[数][计] 运算
有效的；运转着的；从事生产劳动的

trans.tran_cn: 手术的，（计划、法律等）实施中的，起作用的，最适合的，关键词句
trans.tran_en: working and able to be used

trans.tran_cn: 工作人员，（尤指）体力劳动者，密探，（尤指政府的）特工人员
trans.tran_en: a worker, especially a factory worker – used in business
